Frequently updated data for drawCircular and drawLinear

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RenderData = {
    mouseX: number;
    mouseY: number;
    circluarCamera: {
        angleOffset: number;
        scrollOffsetZoomed: number;
        scrollOffsetZooming: number;
        value: CircularCameraProgress;
        target: CircularCameraProgress;
    };
    matrix: Matrix;
};
```
